body:
PR created by Kshitij Mehta from the Scientific Data Group at ORNL.

PR contains:
- general updates for adios such as newer version 1.12.0
- addition of staging transports
- addition of new transform

This work is part of the ECP CODAR project. 

Contacts: Norbert Podhorzski @pnorbert, ORNL, and Matthew Wolf, ORNL
title: Adios
